price: Kun kennaa keenyaa, dhumti isaaf hin jiru.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
